content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: furnace
inventory=[{"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 5, "index": 19}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 29}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 64, "index": 32}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft a furnace, I need to place blackstone or cobblestone in all slots except the center one. Since there is no blackstone in the inventory, I will use cobblestone instead. I will start by moving the cobblestone from slot 29 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: furnace
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 5, "index": 19}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 29}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 64, "index": 32}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: Next, I will move another cobblestone from slot 29 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 2 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 5, "index": 19}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 64, "index": 32}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]

inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 5, "index": 19}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 64, "index": 32}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I need to fill in the rest of the slots in the crafting grid. I will move a blackstone from slot 19 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 4 with quantity 1
